name: David Ramirez
text: I think I read this before.     And, well. We are actually way beyond the US on that axis now, because people are now at: accusation is sufficient justification for death.     And only a pretty small minority of us seem to find that problematic.     The rest are outright cheering it, or are 3-Monkeys-ing themselves to pretend that everything's fine because in their personal experience things are better, so who cares about statistics--nob ody good they know is being killed, just bad guys. Religious Christian-types  who pray for all kinds of stuff are like "What? Innocents killed? Never heard of it," or the news is biased, etc.
